name: hsbc-digital-banking
description: A modern HSBC Digital Banking application built with Flutter

scripts.install-flutter: git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable && export PATH="$PATH:`pwd`/flutter/bin" && flutter precache
scripts.build: export PATH="$PATH:`pwd`/flutter/bin" && flutter build web --release --pwa-strategy offline-first
scripts.vercel-build: npm run install-flutter && npm run build
